name: inpatient
description:
For the best experience, please download this game and turn on your audio!

A resource for those who need to make a big decision.  Inspired by recent events and my own inpatient journey.

This game is in beta.  Please report any bugs/glitches you find.

Support my work at http://patreon.com/norbez/

My Discord: Norbez#4011
